name: Moto Furious Traffic Racer
description:
Drive your motorbike through traffic, earn cash, upgrade your powerups and hire the best motorbike champions.
Run far as you can, conquest the world rankings, win all achievement and the road will never be the same!
Moto Furious : Traffic Racer is a 3D endless arcade racing game.

FEATURES

- Stunning scenario with dangerous blind curves
- 3 fantastic cameras
- Try to get new all 2 powerups: Nitro, Magnet
- Many motorbikes you can choice

GAMEPLAY

- Tap to left button to brake
- Tap to right button to nitro speed
- Take the nitro to speed up to 300 Km / h
- Take the magnet to collect all coins on the road
